SEARCH

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
GUI
public class GUI extends Object
GUI class provides the graphical representation of the application and handles various functionalities related to the application's interface.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JPanel
    bottomPanel()
    Generates the bottom panel view of the application with functionalities like Checkout, order History, Trends, and Availability.

    Creates and returns the central JPanel which manages and displays different panels based on a card layout.

  • Constructor Details

    • GUI

      public GUI()
      Main constructor for the GUI class. It initializes and sets up the main JFrame for the application, setting up the layout, dimensions, and populating it with various panels.

  • Method Details

    • bottomPanel

      public JPanel bottomPanel()
      Generates the bottom panel view of the application with functionalities like Checkout, order History, Trends, and Availability.
      Returns:
      JPanel that contains the bottom panel view.

    • homePage

      public JPanel homePage()

      Returns:
      JPanel containing the home page elements.

    • trendsPage

      public JPanel trendsPage()
      Creates and returns a JPanel for the trends page which contains different panels navigated through buttons on a navigation bar.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing the trends page elements.

    • centerPanel

      public JPanel centerPanel()
      Creates and returns the central JPanel which manages and displays different panels based on a card layout.
      Returns:
      JPanel containing the central display.
